T02TD2355E:6b-1: stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin 'dres //
T02TD2355E:6b-2: stong nyid dbyer med rgyun mi 'chad par yod //
T02TD2355E:6b-3: bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor med mthong //
T02TD2355E:6b-4: nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug / nam mkha' nam mkhar sbyor bde ma mthong //
T02TD2355E:6b-5: 'khor bas bcings pa'i sa la de mi gnas //
T02TD2355E:6b-6: bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong //
T02TD2355E:6b-7: nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug / de 'dra'i rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i khyim las g-yo //
T02TD2355E:6b-8: snying rje'i ro chen dri ma med pa yin //
T02TD2355E:6b-9: bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong //
T02TD2355E:6b-10: nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug / sa ra ha sa brjod gang gzhan ci phyir byed //
T02TD2355E:6b-11: nyin dang mtshan du nam mkha' 'jo phyir 'gro //
T02TD2355E:6b-12: bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong //
T02TD2355E:6b-13: nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug / sa ra ha'i glu rdzogs so//
